device_mount: Handheld; Mounted to wall; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
devices_included: Phone; Tabletop, large horizontal display; Whiteboard, large vertical display
use_cases_desc: Retail scenario. Involving personal devices (phone) together with the semi-public devices such as the tabletop and large interactive wall display.
contribution_desc: A multi-surface prototype (i.e., tabletop + phone) for use in retail environments.
interaction_techniques: Receiving product information; Customized product menus
crossdevice_def: "Multi-surface Environments (MSE) allow information to be shared among various devices such as tabletops, wall displays, mobile phones and tablets."
